about.title: About AORON
about.desc: AORON is a manufacturing brand offering stylish, quality and competitive apparel for B2B partnerships. We have been operating since 1991 and specialize in creating men's and women's clothing, focused on wholesale, retail chains and custom orders for brands and boutiques.
directions: Prince - a classic line of men's suits, proven by time and quality;
AORON - a modern brand with an expanded assortment: from casual wear to accessories and shoes.
about.productionDesc: Our company started with a team of 4 people and today employs over 100 people. In the summer of 2025, we are launching a new factory with the ability to scale production - up to 500 employees and 5000+ units per month.
offer: Flexibility to work under private label
why: More than 30 years of experience in the market of Uzbekistan
Full cycle of production - from design to packaging
Ability to create collections for your brand
Modern models inspired by global trends
Favorable conditions for distributors, marketplaces and stores
about.assortmentSubtitle: Men's and women's T-shirts, shirts, shorts
assortment: Men's and women's T-shirts, shirts, shorts
Collaborations and capsule collections to your specifications

about.missionDesc: To create exceptional menswear that empowers men to look and feel their best, while maintaining a commitment to quality, sustainability, and ethical practices.

card1.title: Quality First
card1.subtitle: We never compromise on quality. From fabrics to construction, every element is carefully chosen for excellence.

card2.title: Sustainability
card2.subtitle: We're committed to reducing our environmental impact through responsible sourcing and sustainable practices.

card3.title: Innovation
card3.subtitle: We embrace new ideas and technologies to deliver modern, relevant products.
